text: Barry Michael Boughner (born January 29, 1948 in Delhi, Ontario) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey right winger. He played 20 National Hockey League games with the Oakland Seals/California Golden Seals, going scoreless with 11 penalty minutes. Boughner served as head coach for the Niagara Falls Flyers of the Ontario Hockey Association for a portion of the 1979–80 season. ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:California Golden Seals players Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:New Haven Nighthawks players Category:Oakland Seals players Category:Providence Reds players Category:International Hockey League (1945–2001) players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Barry Boughner
